channel.title: Exception in thread "main"
channel.description:
[size=18pt]EDIT-- FIXED NOTEPAD++ WASN"T UPDATING And I lowered the number [/size]
So I have a 317 Project Insanity as a base and jsut hosting it for my brother and I, and I get this error when I try to edit the "perfect_ring" to give better stats(K0 things). Now I am getting this error when I run the server and not in the compiler.
CMD error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9999999999" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:372) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:77)[/code]
My Item.cfg [code]item = 773 'perfect'_ring It's_a_'perfect'_ring. 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999 999[/code]
Sorry for not using spoilers [spoiler][/spoiler] didn't work

item.title: Exception in thread "main"
item.dc:creator: @Blind_Gnome Blind Gnome
item.description:
@Blind_Gnome wrote:

[size=18pt]EDIT-- FIXED NOTEPAD++ WASN"T UPDATING
And I lowered the number
[/size]

So I have a 317 Project Insanity as a base and jsut hosting it for my brother and I, and I get this error when I try to edit the “perfect_ring” to give better stats(K0 things). Now I am getting this error when I run the server and not in the compiler.

CMD error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9999999999" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:372) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:77)

My Item.cfg

Sorry for not using spoilers [spoiler][/spoiler] didn’t work
